nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure we want it to be in errored, is it possible to do this validation and just fail to create the service?

Discussed offline, there will be a separate task for input validation for all IPC services. Early failure will be handled in that task. Added a TODO to make sure skipif is not missed in the Service constructor.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+services:
+  test:
+    lifecycle:
+      run:
+        debian:
+          skipif: This is broken
+          script: echo "Running test" && sleep 10
+        macos:
+          skipif: This is broken
+          script: echo "Running test" && sleep 10
+  main:
+    lifecycle:
+      run:
+        script: echo "Running main" && sleep 60
+    dependencies:
+      - git

@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@

+        script: echo "Running main" && sleep 60
+    dependencies:
